column5: Upstairs garage apartment in historic East End neighborhood. Quiet except for the occasional fast car, fiesta or train horn. Close to downtown, Hobby Airport and the University of Houston. Queen bed and a queen sleeper sofa to sleep a total of 4 adults. Pack and Play for a baby or toddler if needed. Full kitchen and full bathroom. Table seats 4 for eating or working. Free Wifi. No TV. Shared washer and dryer in the garage. Steep driveway so street parking only.
